page.title: 19CLUBS IN ST.MARTINS
page.content: The{St.Martins Darby and Joan Club}was formed about{35}years ago.They meet every{Monday,}6.00.to 8.00.p.m.in the {Miners'Institute.}Anyone who is{60 or {over}may join.It costs{12p.}per week and this includes refreshments and two raffle tickets.At the meetings{cards} and{dominoes}are played and then the refreshments are served.At the end of the evening there is usually some {entertainment.}In the summer,the club goes on{tours}and{trips}and in the winter they go to see{pantomimes}and {shows.} The{2nd.St.Martins Cubs and Scouts}was formed in 1978.There are{three}leaders and they meet every{Friday}night in the{Old School,}the Cubs at 7.00 p.m. and Scouts at 8.00 p.m.There are about {8 scouts}and{20 cubs}and the weekly subscription is{30p.}During the year there are{two camps.
